hero.subtitle: The AI consulting boutique for tomorrow's companies.

about.label: Our perspective
about.title1: Most companies don't have a technology problem.
about.intro: They know that Artificial Intelligence can transform their business, but not:
about.point3: what's hype and what's real impact,
about.point4: nor how to make decisions without paralyzing the organization.
about.description1: Our consulting is not about developing software, it's about diagnosing and governing transformation so that AI has real impact.
about.description2: We work with CEOs and founders who seek tangible results, not endless experiments.

dont.item1_desc: We're not a software development agency. We diagnose, prototype, and govern transformation so that AI has real impact.
dont.item2_desc: If AI isn't the best solution for your problem, we'll tell you.
dont.item3_desc: We don't implement anything you can't understand, audit, and control.
dont.item4_desc: We focus on deliverables and results, not warming chairs.

do.item1_desc: We prioritize projects by their ability to save or generate revenue.
do.item2_desc: We use what works, whether it's the newest model or a simple solution.
do.item3_desc: We train your team so you don't depend on us forever.
do.item4_desc: We engage with your business goals as if they were our own.

service1.title: AI Strategic Diagnostic
service1.point2: where AI can improve efficiency or reduce costs,
service1.point3: which use cases have direct impact on the P&L,
service1.point4: and which initiatives shouldn't even be started.
service1.result: Result: clarity, focus, and real priorities.

service2.title: AI Strategic Roadmap Definition
service2.intro: We design an AI adoption plan aligned with:
service2.result: It's not a technology roadmap, it's a business roadmap supported by AI.

service3.title: AI Transformation Project Management
service3.intro: We lead exciting projects from definition to execution.
service3.point4: We recommend internal or external teams.
service3.point5: We act as an independent control point.
service3.result: The company executes. We guarantee judgement, focus, and coherence.

service4.title: Executive CTO
service4.intro: The new most important role in the company.
service4.target3: Companies with significant revenue and complex processes
service4.provide1: Technology criteria aligned with finance and strategy
service4.result: We don't make isolated technical decisions. We make decisions that affect value, risk, and growth.

benefits.label: Value
benefits.benefit5: Peace of mind in critical moments.

footer.tagline: We help companies navigate the AI era with strategy, honesty, and focus on results.

service_detail.cta_title: Shall we talk about how to apply this to your company?

diagnostico.title: AI Strategic Diagnostic
diagnostico.subtitle: Understand before investing
diagnostico.p1: Every relevant AI decision is, at its core, a capital allocation decision. The problem is that many companies invest without first understanding where AI can truly change the economics of the business.
diagnostico.p2: The AI Strategic Diagnostic is the mandatory starting point to avoid that mistake.
diagnostico.axes_title: This service analyzes the company from four inseparable axes:
diagnostico.axis1_desc: Where value is created and where it's eroded.
diagnostico.axis2_desc: Processes that limit efficiency, scale, or margin.
diagnostico.axis3_desc: Decisions that are made today with incomplete or late data.
diagnostico.axis4_desc: Real capacity to absorb technological change.
diagnostico.p3: We don't look for "interesting use cases". We look for economic levers.
diagnostico.p4: Each opportunity is evaluated with simple but uncomfortable questions:
diagnostico.q2: What happens if it doesn't work?
diagnostico.q3: What's the opportunity cost of not doing it?
diagnostico.q4: Does this problem deserve AI or does it deserve management?
diagnostico.result_title: The result is a clear picture of:
diagnostico.result2: Where it can reduce structural costs.
diagnostico.result3: And where it doesn't make sense to invest a single euro.
diagnostico.conclusion: This diagnostic doesn't accelerate decisions. It avoids wrong ones.

roadmap.title: AI Strategic Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Turning judgement into direction
roadmap.p1: Once you understand where the value is, the next risk is trying to capture it all at once.
roadmap.p2: The AI Strategic Roadmap is the natural evolution of the diagnostic: it converts the analysis into an ordered sequence of decisions, aligned with the business strategy and the company's financial capacity.
roadmap.questions_title: This roadmap answers questions that are rarely well formulated:
roadmap.q1: Which initiatives should be done now and which can wait?
roadmap.q2: Which decisions are reversible and which are not?
roadmap.q3: Where is it better to learn cheaply before scaling?
roadmap.q4: What impact does each initiative have on margins, cost structure, and operational risk?
roadmap.priority_title: Each initiative is prioritized according to:
roadmap.p3: The roadmap doesn't seek to maximize innovation, but to optimize risk-adjusted return. It introduces discipline, focus, and temporal logic that protects the long term.
roadmap.p4: In governance terms, the roadmap makes AI something governable, defensible to the board and investors.

direccion.title: AI Transformation Project Management
direccion.subtitle: Execute without destroying value
direccion.p1: Most AI projects don't fail in design. They fail in execution.
direccion.p2: This service exists to ensure that what's defined in the roadmap materializes without strategic deviations, hidden cost overruns, or unnecessary over-engineering.
direccion.function_title: Our function is not to develop, but to direct:
direccion.function2: we prevent the project from growing out of control
direccion.function4: we protect the initial economic logic
direccion.layer_intro: We act as a governance layer between:
direccion.p3: This is especially relevant in projects with structural impact: deep automations, critical predictive systems, cross-functional platforms.
direccion.p4: Here the error is not technical, it's strategic: poorly made decisions today condition costs and flexibility for years.
direccion.conclusion: Our job is to keep the project within the limits that make it profitable, scalable, and sustainable.

executive_cto.title: Executive CTO
executive_cto.subtitle: Governing technology as a strategic asset
executive_cto.p1: In companies of a certain size, technology ceases to be a function and becomes a financial asset. At that point, the CTO role is no longer just technical: it's strategic, financial, and organizational.
executive_cto.p2: The Executive CTO service covers that role at board level when independent judgement is needed, irreversible decisions are being made, or technology directly conditions the company's valuation.
executive_cto.perspective1_desc: Architecture, scalability, dependency, and real debt.
executive_cto.perspective2_desc: Impact on CAPEX, OPEX, margins, and risk.
executive_cto.perspective3_desc: Alignment with growth, focus, and positioning.
executive_cto.participation3: Support to CFO and CEO in critical decisions.
executive_cto.participation4: M&A processes, both buy and sell side.
executive_cto.conclusion: The Executive CTO doesn't seek to accelerate for the sake of it. It seeks to preserve value and avoid mistakes that can't be undone.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy and Data Protection
privacy.section1_content2: Address: Plaza Curtidos Hnos. Dorta, 7 - 38005, Santa Cruz de Tfe.
privacy.section2_intro: Your data will be processed for the following purposes:
privacy.section2_item1: Managing the commercial relationship and service provision
privacy.section2_item2: Sending commercial communications about our services
privacy.section2_item3: Responding to your inquiries and requests
privacy.section2_item4: Improving our services and user experience
privacy.section3_intro: The processing of your data is based on:
privacy.section3_item1: The execution of a contract or commercial relationship
privacy.section3_item3: The legitimate interest of the controller
privacy.section4_content: Personal data will be retained as long as the commercial relationship is maintained and its deletion is not requested, and where applicable, for the years necessary to comply with legal obligations.
privacy.section5_content: Your data will not be transferred to third parties except for legal obligations or when necessary for the provision of the requested services.
privacy.section6_content: You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability, and objection by writing to info@taulergroup.com
privacy.section7_content: You can file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (www.aepd.es) if you consider that the processing does not comply with current regulations.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.section1_content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. These cookies allow us to recognize your browser and, if you have a registered account, link it to your registered account to provide you with a personalized experience.
cookies.section2_type1_item1: They allow navigation and the use of basic functionalities
cookies.section2_type1_item2: They are essential for the website to function
cookies.section2_type2_item1: They allow us to analyze the use of the website to improve our services
cookies.section2_type2_item2: We use Google Analytics and other tools
cookies.section2_type3_item1: They allow remembering information to improve your experience
cookies.section2_type3_item2: Such as the preferred language or the region you are in
cookies.section3_content1: You can configure your browser to reject all cookies or to receive a notice when a cookie is sent. However, if you reject cookies, some parts of our website may not function properly.
cookies.section3_content2: Most browsers accept cookies automatically, but you can modify your browser settings to reject them if you prefer.
cookies.section4_content: For more information about the use of cookies and your rights, you can contact us at info@taulergroup.com
